outputs.output_descr: This project aims to implement general strategies and tools to support the nuclei and local productive arrangements with a view to developing production of endogenous less dynamic sub-regions of Northeast Brazil. The strategies and methodologies developed through this project will provide a collection of pilot experiences to be used by the Ministry of National Integration in future regional and national interventions.

This project aims to implement general strategies and tools to support the nuclei and local productive arrangements with a view to developing production of endogenous less dynamic sub-regions of Northeast Brazil. The strategies and methodologies developed through this project will provide a collection of pilot experiences to be used by the Ministry of National Integration in future regional and national interventions.

project_descr: Projeto de Desenvolvimento Socioeconômico de Sub-regiões do Nordeste do Brasil
project_title: BRA/04/024 - Social and Economic Development for Brazil
